item.title: Black Killer
item.description: Black Killer is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Carlo Croccolo and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Professionisti per un massacro
item.description: Red Blood, Yellow Gold, is a 1967 Italian-Spanish spaghetti western film directed by Nando Cicero.

item.title: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven
item.description: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone and starring Brett Halsey.

item.title: Death Sentence
item.description: Death Sentence is a 1968 spaghetti western directed by Mario Lanfranchi and starring Richard Conte.

item.title: More Dollars for the MacGregors
item.description: More Dollars for the MacGregors is a 1970 Spaghetti Western film directed by José Luis Merino and starring Peter Lee Lawrence, Carlos Quiney and Malisa Longo.
